mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(user_id, user_name, password, role, ssn, cell_phone, addr, email, reg_date) VALUES( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, 'user' , #{ssn:VARCHAR}, #{phone:VARCHAR}, #{addr:VARCHAR}, #{email:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, password, role, cell_phone, addr, email, reg_date FROM users WHERE user_id = #{value}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT user_id , user_name , email FROM users
user_id LIKE '%'||#{search.searchKeyword}||'%'
user_name LIKE '%'||#{search.searchKeyword}||'%'
user_email LIKE '%'||#{search.searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY user_id ${sort} ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= ${search.currentPage*search.pageSize} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN ${(search.currentPage-1)*search.pageSize+1} AND ${search.currentPage*search.pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT user_id , user_name , email FROM users
WHERE user_id LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE user_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE user_email LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
) countTable
